article.title: Important Zites
article.text:
[http://127.0.0.1:43110/15Pf9VVuDT8NSWj1qUBh4V89yPmrmzRw6a Important Zites], created by [[Krixano]], was a zite that listed the most important and useful zites by category. It was created before [[ZeroSites]]. You were able to select a category from a menu on the side to filter out the list. Later, a search feature was added with the ability to open the first zite listed in a new tab when you press Enter. Eventually, Krixano added the ability to request zites be added or removed. After ZeroSites was released, the zite was rarely updated.

=== Update on February 19, 2018 ===
* Added ZeroLSTN, ZeroExchange, Kiwipedia, KopyKate BIG, EulerFinder, Zoogle Zearch, RVRE, BloxelWars!, and Git Center.
* Marked some search engines as outdated (including Kaffiene, SnifferDog, RVRE, Kidsearch, and Onesearch).
* Removed some zites (including TorrentFreak and Zule)
